titles.title: Protecting Homeowners in Bankruptcy Act of 2020
Protecting Homeowners in Bankruptcy Act of 2020
Protecting Homeowners in Bankruptcy Act of 2020
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to increase the amount of the allowable homestead exemption.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 18 - 5.

bill.summary:
Protecting Homeowners in Bankruptcy Act of 2020
This bill increases the homestead exemption an individual debtor can claim in a bankruptcy to $100,000.
